profile.setBackupPassword: Deji eray-sir si aad u qariso kaydka:

profile.importSuccess: Furaha gaarka ah waxaa lagu keenay aaladdan.
profile.importFailed: Ku keeniddu way fashilantay (eray-sir khaldan ama fayl dhaawacan).
profile.keysRotated: Lammaanaha furaha cusub waa la sameeyey waxaana la geliyey furaha dadweynaha.
profile.importKey: Soo dejiso kaydka furaha ee la qarxiyey
profile.keyDisclaimer: Furahaaga gaarka ah marnaba kama baxo aaladdan. Dhoofso nuqul eray-sir leh si aad ugu soo celiso aalad kale.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Waxaad ku jirtaa Free‚Äîku isticmaal Sun/Moon hoosta. U cusbooneysii si aad u furto mowduucyo badan.
profile.backupDesc: Abuur kaydyo eray-sir leh oo furaha ah, kuna soo celi aalad kale si aad u isu waafajiso.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Qari marka app-ka aan la isticmaalin
profile.notifyOnCopy: I ogeysii haddii farriimadayda la koobiyo
profile.loadFailed: Ku shubistu ee profile-ka wey fashilantay
profile.followHint: Sheekooyinkooda waxay ka muuqan doonaan quudinta 'Raacayaal' haddii ay ku dhajiyaan dhagaystayaal Raacayaal (ama Dadweyne).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: U gudbi wicitaannada iyo fariimaha soo gelaya taleefoon ama iimayl la xaqiijiyey. Wicitaannada/qoraallada baxaya waxay muujin karaan lambarka Chatforia.
profile.errSmsDest: Dooro ugu yaraan hal meel loo gudbiyo (taleefoon ama iimayl).
profile.errQuietHours: Saacadaha aamusnaantu waa inay ahaadaan inta u dhexeysa 0 iyo 23.

support.heading: Sideen kuu caawin karnaa?
support.contactIntro: Waxaan kuugu jawaabi doonaa iimayl. Ku dar faahfaahin naga caawin karta inaan ku celcelinno dhibaatada.
support.sent: Fariin waa la diray. Iimayl ayaanu kaga jawaabi doonaa.
support.sendError: Lama dirin. Fadlan iimayl u dir support@chatforia.com.

home.title: Guri
home.subheader: Dir fariin si aad u bilowdo sheeko.
home.sendTooltipEmpty: Qor fariin si aad u dirto

press.title: Warbaahinta
press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia waa app farriimeed qarsoodi-u-horrayn ah oo ka dhigaya sheeko-luqado-kala-duwan mid fudud. Fariimaha si toos ah ayaa loo qarsoodiyeeyaa, turjumaadduna waxay taageertaa 100+ luuqadood waqtiga-dhabta ah. Isticmaalayaashu waxay daaran karaan fariimaha baaba'a, waxayna dooran karaan aqris-ogaanshaha, ayna isku-dheellitiri karaan aalado. Waxa laga heli karaa iOS, Android, iyo web.
press.scanTip: Miyaa ku jira desktop? Ku sawir taleefoonkaaga si aad u hesho app-ka.

careers.title: Shaqooyin
careers.intro: Waxaan nahay koox yar oo dhisaysa farriimeeye gaar ah, caalami ah. Haddii aad ka welwelsan tahay qarsoodi, helitaan, iyo UX qurux badan, waan kaaga mahadcelinaynaa inaad nala xiriirto.
careers.openRoles: Jagooyin furan: Injineernimo (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Alaab, Taageero.
careers.apply: Sida loo codsado: U soo dir CV/isku-xirayaasha jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Ku saabsan Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia waa farriimeeye ammaan ah, badan-luuqado leh oo leh qarsoodi dhammaad ilaa dhammaad, turjumaad degdeg ah, iyo wicitaan cod/fiidiyoow. Ujeedadeenu waa mid fudud: dadku ha isku xirmaan‚Äîsi ammaan ah, gaar ah, iyo luuqado kala duwan.

values.access: <bold>Helitaan qof walba:</bold> Si toos ah u turjun 100+ luuqadood.
values.access_aria: Helitaan qof walba: Si toos ah u turjun 100+ luuqadood.
values.control_aria: Xakameyn: Fariimaha baaba'a iyo aqris-ogaansho waa ikhtiyaari.

about.howDescription: Fariimaha waxaa lagu qarsoodiyeeyaa aaladdaada ka hor intaysan bixin. Turjumaad, kaydad, iyo is-waafajin aalado waxaa loo qaabeeyey in la yareeyo waxa adeeggayagu arki karo.

advertise.title: Ku xayaysii Chatforia
advertise.description: Gaar isticmaaleyaal firfircoon oo farriimeed adigoon qasbin. Waxaan bixinnaa boosas muuqaal leh, kafaala-qaadyo, iyo xayeysiisyo gudaha ah. Kuwa Premium ma arkaan xayeysiis.

adsense.withPubId: Hadda waxaan adeegsaneynaa Google AdSense. Haddii aad rabto inaad na beegsato Google Ads, isticmaal aqoonsiga daabacaha {{pubId}} oo codso boosaska hoos ku xusan. Kafaala-qaad toos ah waa la heli karaa‚Äîisticmaal foomka.
adsense.noPubId: Hadda waxaan adeegsaneynaa Google AdSense. Kafaala-qaad toos ah sidoo kale waa la heli karaa‚Äîisticmaal foomka hoose.

advertise.noPlacements: Boosas lama qaabeeynin weli. Ku dar gudaha ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Kulan badan iyo joogitaan dheer gudaha UI-ga sheekada
why.brandSafe: Qaababka sumad-amniga leh; xaddididda soo noqnoqoshada ixtiraam leh
why.sponsoredMoments: Daqiiqado kafaala-qaad ah (tusaale, "Bilow Sheeko") waa la heli karaa
why.deals: Heshiisyo toos ah ama barnaamij ahaan via AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Mahadsanid! Waynu helnay. Waxaan kula soo xiriiri doonaa dhowaan.
form.missingRequired: Fadlan buuxi magac, iimayl, iyo fariin.
form.successToast: Mahadsanid! Waan kula soo xiriiri doonaa dhawaan.
form.mailtoInfo: Waxaan furaynaa app-ka iimaylkaaga si aad u dirto codsiga‚Ä¶

upgrade.title: Cusbooneysii
upgrade.subtitle: Fur qorshaha kugu habboon: ka bax xayeysiisyada Plus, ama hel awoodda buuxda Premium.
upgrade.benefitsLine: Fur sifooyin awood leh & ka saar xayaysiisyada.

scheduleBanner.title: Is-qoristu way dhammaan doontaa

features.sameFeatures: Sifooyin isku mid ah sida Bille

gettingStarted.title: Sida Loo Bilaabo
gettingStarted.subtitle: Ma ku cusub tahay Chatforia? Hage degdeg ah oo ku tusaya aasaaska si aad daqiiqado ku bilaabato.

alert.text: Hagahan wuu kori doonaa marka aan sifooyin cusub sii dayno. Haddii wax kaa maqan yihiin, nala soo xiriir adigoo maraya

section2.title: 2) Bilow farriimeyn
section2.item1: Abuur DM ama Koox oo dir fariintaadii ugu horreysay.
section2.item2: Adeegso turjumaad degdeg ah si aad uga sheekaysato 100+ luuqadood.
section2.item3: Isku day fariimaha baaba'a iyo aqris-ogaanshaha gudaha Profile ‚Üí Qarsoodi.

section3.title: 3) Aad dheeraad
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = aan xayeysiis lahayn, Premium = sifooyin buuxa).
section3.item2Part1: Ku xiro aalado dheeraad ah oo deji kaydad qarsoon gudaha

account.q: Sideen u abuuraa ama u soo ceshadaa koontadayda?
account.a: Soo dejiso app-ka ama isticmaal web, taabo ‚ÄúAbuur koonto‚Äù, xaqiiji iimayl/taleefoon. Si aad u soo ceshato, isticmaal ‚ÄúMa iloowday eray-sirka‚Äù.

privacy.a: Haa. Fariimaha iyo wicitaannada waa dhammaad ilaa dhammaad asalka ahaan. Adiga iyo qofka kale oo keliya ayaa akhriyi kara.

translate.q: Sidee buu u shaqeeyaa turjumaadda degdegga ah?
translate.a: Daar ‚ÄúAuto-translate‚Äù gudaha Dejinta ‚Üí Muuqaal & Luuqad. Waxaan ku turjuntaa aaladda marka la taageero, haddii kale API-yo ammaan ah oo xog yar leh.

contact.a: Nala soo xiriir support@chatforia.com. Ku dar sawirro iyo nooca app-ka.

contact.title: Nala Soo Xiriir
contact.successMsg: Mahadsanid‚Äîkooxdayadu waxay kugu jawaabi doontaa iimayl.
contact.errorSend: Lama dirin. Fadlan iimayl u dir support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Qaanuunkan Qarsoodiga wuxuu sharxayaa sida Chatforia (‚Äúannaga‚Äù) u ururino, u isticmaalno, oo aan ula wadaagno xogta marka aad adeegsanayso app-yadayada iyo adeegyada. Waxaan u qaabaynnaa Chatforia in xogta aan arki karno la yareeyo.

infoWeCollect.title: Xogta aan ururinno
infoWeCollect.account: Xog koonto (tusaale, iimayl/taleefoon) si loo abuuro oo loo sugo koontadaada.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Waxyaabaha la qarsoodiyey (fariimo/wicitaanno) waa dhammaad ilaa dhammaad; annagu ma akhriyi karno.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Jab/isticmaal sida log-yada jabitaanka, nooca aaladda, ama falanqayn kooban si wax loo hagaajiyo.

howWeUse.title: Sida aan xogta u isticmaalno
howWeUse.provide: Inaan bixino oo sugno adeegga (gali, ogaanshaha spam/xadgudub).

sharing.title: Wadaagis
sharing.body: Ma iibinno xogta shaqsiga. Waxaan la wadaagi karnaa xog kooban farsamayaqaanno (tusaale, riixidda ogeysiisyada, falanqayn) heshiisyo adag hoostooda.

rights.title: Xuquuqdaada
rights.body: Iyadoo ku xiran gobolkaaga (tusaale, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), waxaad codsan kartaa helid, sixid, tirtirid, ama ka-baxid habayn gaar ah. Nala xiriir: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kaydinta xogta & amniga
retention.body: Waxaan haynaa waxa kaliya ee lagama maarmaanka u ah hawlgelinta oo waxaan adeegsannaa amniga heer warshadeed. E2E-ga annaga lama furi karo.

children.title: Carruurta
children.body: Chatforia looma jeedin carruur ka yar 13 (ama sida sharcigaaga degaanku qabo).

changes.title: Isbeddello
changes.body: Waxaan halkan ku dhigi doonaa cusboonaysiino oo waxaan beddeli doonaa taariikhda ‚ÄúLa cusbooneysiiyey‚Äù.

intro.body: Markaad adeegsato Chatforia waxaad aqbashay Shuruudahaan. Haddii aadan oggolayn, ha adeegsan adeegga.

accounts.title: Koontooyinka
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Bixi xog sax ah oo ilaali aqoonsiyada.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Waxaad mas'uul ka tahay waxa ka dhaca koontadaada.

acceptableUse.title: Isticmaal la aqbali karo
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ha gelin wax sharci-darro, xadgudub, ama ku xadgudub xuquuq; spam ama isticmaal xad-dhaaf ah ha sameyn.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Waxaan joojin/kala bixi karnaa adeegga haddii la jebiyo.

yourContent.title: Waxyaabahaaga
yourContent.body: Xuquuqda waxaad ku leedahay waxyaabahaaga. Waxaad na siisaa xuquuqda lagama maarmaanka u ah hawlgelinta adeegga (tusaale, u gudbinta, kaydinta, turjumaadda).

disclaimer.title: Ka-digista & mas'uuliyadda
disclaimer.body: Adeegga waxaa lagu bixiyaa ‚Äúsida uu yahay‚Äù dammaanad la'aan. Ilaa heerka sharcigu oggol yahay, Chatforia masuul kama aha khasaare dhexdhexaad ah ama daba-dheer.

changes.title: Isbeddello
changes.body: Waxaan cusbooneysiin karnaa shuruudahan; isticmaalka joogtada ah kadib cusboonaysiinta wuxuu ka dhigan yahay oggolaansho.

doNotSell.title: Ha Iibin ama Ha La Wadaagin Xogtayda Shaqsiga
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ma iibiso xog shaqsiyeed. Deganeyaasha California waxay weli gudbin karaan codsiyo CPRA iyagoo adeegsanaya badhanka hoose.

cookies.title: Dejinta Kukiyada
cookies.body: Chatforia waxay isticmaashaa kukiyo yar (tusaale, fadhi, amni). Ma isticmaalno kukiyada xayaysiisyada dhinac saddexaad. Maamul kukiyada gudaha dejinta biraawsarkaaga.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Lama soo rogi karo xaaladda lambarka taleefanka.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Lambar lama siinin. Ka dooro code-ka aagga si aad u bilowdo qoraalka.

startChatModal.title: Bilow sheeko
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Qor magac, magac-isticmaale, taleefoon, ama iimayl‚Ä¶
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Qor magac-isticmaale ama taleefoon kadibna riix Raadi.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Gelidda taleefoonka/iimaylka waxay muuqan doonaan markaad u kaydiso xiriirro ahaan.

sounds.freeNotice: Waxaad ku jirtaa Free ‚Äî laxanada premium waa muuqdaan laakiin waa xiran yihiin. U cusbooneysii si aad u furto dhammaan.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Sifooyinkan waxay u baahan yihiin qorshaha Premium.

aiSettings.title: Dejinta AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Xakamee turjumaadda, jawaabaha caqliga leh, iyo jawaab-tooska ForiaBot.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Si toos ah u turjun fariimaha soo galaya
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Muuji qoraalka asalka ah agtiisa turjumaad
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: U dir AI dhowrka fariimood ee ugu dambeeyey (nadiifiyey) si ay u soo jeediso jawaabo degdeg ah.
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Haddii la daarro, talooyinka AI waxay qarin doonaan erayada la calaamadeeyey
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Daar jawaab-toosiye marka aan mashquul ahay
aiSettings.saveFailed: Kaydintu ee dejinta AI way fashilantay

accessibilitySettings.title: Helitaan & Digniino
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Ikhtiyaarro ka dhigaya Chatforia mid fudud in loo adeegsado adigoon ku tiirsanaan dhawaaq.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Waxay ka bilaabataa cabbir caadi ah. Kordhi haddii aad jeceshahay qoraal weyn.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Digniino muuqaal ah farriimo & wicitaanno
Muuji boorarrada iyo ilbax-ilbax si aadan wax u seegin.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Gariir marka fariimo cusub yimaadaan (haddii la taageero)
Dhaqaaji gariirka aaladda iyadoo la raacayo ogeysiisyada.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Ku iftiimi shaashadda wicitaan soo galaya
Iftiin degdeg ah marka wicitaan dhaco.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Si toos ah u qoraal-rog fariimaha codka
Ku lifaaq qoraal fariimaha cod ee aad hesho.
accessibilitySettings.changesSavedInstantly: Isbeddelladu isla markiiba waa la kaydiyaa.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Muuji boorarrada iyo ilbax-ilbax si aadan wax u seegin.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Gariir marka fariin cusub timaado (haddii la taageero)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Kici gariirka aaladda iyadoo lala socda ogeysiisyada.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Iftiin kooban oo dhalaalaya marka wicitaan soo yeedho.

privacySection.strictE2EE: Qarsoodi adag oo dhammaad ilaa dhammaad
privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Ku kaydi server-ka qoraal qarsoodi ah oo keliya. Waxa ay demiyaa AI/Turjun iyo hordhacyada kormeerka.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Ka raadi magac kale, magac, magac-isticmaale, ama taleefoon
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Dhowr waddo oo dhaqso ah oo lagu bilaabo.
peoplePage.inviteDesc: La wadaag xiriirkaaga martiqaadka si aad isla markiiba u bilowdaan sheeko.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: La soco markaad socoto adigoo isticmaalaya Chatforia iOS iyo Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Talo: Fariimahaagu way is-waafaqaan web iyo moobil.

randomChat.title: Sheeko Random
randomChat.description: La kulmo qof cusub isla markiiba. Waxaan idin is waafajin doonaa oo furni doonaa qol ku-meel-gaar ah.
randomChat.saveGuard: Kaliya sheeko bini-aadam ilaa bini-aadam ayaa la kaydin karaa

login.title: Ku soo dhawoow mar kale
login.subtitle: Geli koontadaada Chatforia
login.ssoUnavailable: Single-sign-on hadda lama heli karo. Adeegso magac-isticmaale & eray-sir.

error.unprocessable: Codsi aan sax ahayn. Hubi magac-isticmaale/iimayl iyo eray-sir.
error.deviceLimit: Xadka aaladaha ee Qorshaha Free waa la gaaray. Ka bax aalad kale ama u cusbooneysii Premium si aad u xirto aalado badan.
error.premiumRequired: Falalkan waxay u baahan yihiin qorshaha Premium.
